name: MindfulCasted
0:
”Alexa, open mindful casted”
”Alexa, ask mindful casted for the latest update”
”Alexa, start mindful casted”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mindful casted
des:
Mindful Casted is a mindful lifestyle media brand that creates inspiring content focused on mindfulness, meditation, affirmations, and self-care. Our goal is to help you get unstuck in the transformation process and fulfill the goals and growth you want in life.

We created our company to serve busy professionals, entrepreneurs, companies, families, and people who find themselves on the go and don’t necessarily have the time to stop at a yoga studio, holistic wellness center, or join a traditional meditation. Our motto is that mindfulness and growth can happen anytime and anyplace.

Our services include mindful digital tools such as our meditation coach which is available on Amazon Alexa, personalized affirmations, also available on Amazon Alexa, mindful corporate wellness programs, corporate training, workshops, and so much more.

Listen to the latest mindful messages from Mindful Casted. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. You can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
